speaker: Episode 20 - Petals to the Metal- Chapter Three
The Director
lines: There’s a Grand Relic one of our Seekers have found, and it is in the possession... of a master criminal, known as The Raven. The Gaia Sash gives the wearer control over nature.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Taako and Magnus- the door shuts to the elevator, and your, uh, elevator adventure… begins.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You see vines have broken in through the first floor, and are almost like filling up the elevator shaft like water.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Sure enough, there is a… Just sort of black hole, uh, 60 feet above you. It [the rope] has lowered itself into your elevator car!

speaker: Griffin
lines: The vines grab onto the elevator, and it collapses, and falls, and all of a sudden you are supporting Taako’s full weight! And, so, the three of you are now hanging- So this scene was really great, um-

speaker: The Announcer
lines: Goonies never say die. But Dungeon Masters do! Oouuuhh…! ...It’s The Adventure Zone!

speaker: [theme music (Déjà Vu by Mort Garson) plays]
Griffin
lines: I cannot wait… To hear- you got- wait- it’s been… Let’s, let’s take the- the listeners backstage. It’s been about three weeks? Since we were recording. You guys-

speaker: Travis
lines: Don’t take them backstage, it’s all messy.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Now I-- Well- That’s… Whose fault is that?

speaker: Travis
lines: I mean- it’s- it’s mine. Like, I left my water bottle lying around, there’s like a half eaten candy bar at my station…

speaker: Griffin
lines: And your leg- and- and all your LEGOs!

speaker: Travis
lines: How am I supposed to be in character without my LEGOs, Griffin!? It’s in my rider.

speaker: Griffin
lines: It’s been over- it’s been like 21 days. Since our last episode. And I can’t wait to hear… how you plan to get out of this… predicament.

speaker: Justin
lines: I reach up to the giant’s face. And then I pluck the golden dagger from within my sheath.

lines: So this has been our Adventure Zone recap wrap-up fancast, [Clint laughs] where we talk about our own podcasting theories, about the show that we make ourselves.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You three are in an elevator shaft, the elevator has fallen. Uh, Magnus, you are hanging onto a rope, that was fantastically created by- er, it wasn’t created, it was fantastically suspended in the air through an extradimensional portal, by Taako, who I’m… worried. About his relationship with extradimensional portals? I think it’s gonna be a… I think maybe we’re gonna have to have an intervention episode. Here- here in a couple months or so. Ah, you are hanging on to-

lines: Uh, you are hanging on to the very edge of- of this rope, uh, and hanging onto your ankle, is Taako. And hanging on to Taako’s ankle, after an unsuccessful rescue attempt, is Merle. Uh, below you, uh, not too far below you, constantly growing constantly filling this shaft, is a… bed of living vines. Uh, that are, wriggling furiously underneath you, they’re about two floors below you. You are trapped between the 11th and 12th floor, uh, and uh… You were originally heading to the vault on the 20th floor, uh, before, uh, you… were assailed. By- by this arbor.

lines: Guys, I got this. For the last 21 days, since we first got stuck in this elevator shaft, I’ve been writing on my vision board, I’ve been putting the energy out into the world to save us? Uhm, and I’ve been using everything I learned from The Secret, so now, I think we are just… saved!
